meta.description: Determine the number of limousines and buses needed to transport at least 400 people, with at least 70% of the vehicles being limousines, to minimize the total number of vehicles used.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles available for transport

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of vehicle

params.name: min_people
params.description: Minimum number of people to transport

params.name: min_limousine_ratio
params.description: Minimum ratio of limousines to total vehicles

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of vehicle used

objective.name: min_total_vehicles
objective.description: Minimize the total number of vehicles used

constraints.name: min_people_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 400 people are transported

constraints.name: min_limousine_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 70% of the vehicles are limousines
